name: Mana's Christmas
description:
Braelyn, Mana's imaginary friend, is fielding awkward conversations at a nightmarish holiday party in fey.earth's first release—a satirical and tactical JRPG that takes 15 to 30 minutes to complete. Happy Holidays! 

Visit fey.earth to learn more about upcoming titles, including other short games, plus our OTB JRPG, Worlds They Dream.
